sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM TALENT ORDER BY talent_no DESC
select * TALENT where talent_no = (select max(talent_no) from TALENT)
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE c_contnum = #c_contnum# and c_index=1 ORDER BY c_no DESC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM talent WHERE talent_no <= #talent_no# ORDER BY talent_no DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TALENT (TALENT_NO, TALENT_ID, TALENT_STATE, TALENT_SUBJECT, TALENT_NAME, TALENT_CATEGORY, TALENT_PRICE, TALENT_PHONE, TALENT_SIDO, TALENT_GOGON, TALENT_CONTENT, TALENT_IMAGE,MAIN_IMG, READHIT) VALUES (TALENT_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #talent_id#, #talent_state#, #talent_subject#, #talent_name#, #talent_category#, #talent_price#, #talent_phone#, #talent_sido#, #talent_gogon#, #talent_content#, #talent_image#,#main_img#,0)
INSERT INTO comments (C_NO, C_INDEX, C_CONTNUM, C_ID, C_CONTENT, C_REGDATE) VALUES (COMMENTS_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 1, #c_contnum#, #c_id#, #c_content#, #c_regdate#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TALENT SET TALENT_STATE = #talent_state#, TALENT_SUBJECT=#talent_subject#, TALENT_NAME = #talent_name#, TALENT_CATEGORY = #talent_category#, TALENT_PRICE = #talent_price#, TALENT_PHONE = #talent_phone#, TALENT_SIDO=#talent_sido#, TALENT_GOGON=#talent_gogon#, TALENT_CONTENT = #talent_content#, TALENT_IMAGE = #talent_image#, MAIN_IMG=#main_img#
UPDATE MEMBER SET SCORE = SCORE + 5 WHERE ID = #id#
UPDATE MEMBER SET SCORE = SCORE + 1 WHERE ID = #id#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM COMMENTS WHERE C_INDEX=1 and C_NO=#c_no# and C_ID=#c_id#

SELECT COUNT(*) as stal FROM talent WHERE TALENT_ID=#talent_id# AND TALENT_STATE='완'
SELECT * FROM TALENT WHERE TALENT_ID=#talent_id# ORDER BY talent_no DESC
SELECT * FROM TALENT WHERE TALENT_ID=#talent_id# AND TALENT_STATE='완'
